name: Desolation (Prototype)
description:
Desolation is a 2D Action Platformer, loosely following the typical metroidvania formula.

In this game you play as a witch descending into the underground for an unknown reason. You wield a floating sword which you must use to defeat the various creatures roaming the underground.

This version of Desolation is a prototype, and if the project is ever continued, it will be started again from the beginning. (This version was made for a school project)

Controls:
Movement: Arrow keys or WASD
Jump: Spacebar
Attack: X
Sword Toss (When unlocked): Z
Dash (When unlocked): C

Some tips (Because the prototype is lacking a tutorial):

- You can stand on the sword when its attached to a wall

- By hitting a spike while jumping above it, you can bounce off of it

- You heal by doing damage to enemies
